channel.title: C Rank! Shake off a Genjutsu!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "C Rank! Shake off a Genjutsu!" - the mission I see doesn't match the wiki entry...

item.title: Re: C Rank! Shake off a Genjutsu!
item.content:encoded: All season 2 regular missions are +1 difficulty, +1 success. The poison fog thing is new though.

item.title: C Rank! Shake off a Genjutsu!
item.content:encoded: I just looped, and did the C (from D-rank) mission above â€¦ it's described as 8d2s, mine was 9d3s, and in using RedEye on it I found Ninja Art: Poison Fog. Was the mission changed, do things change in Season 2, or was the previous entry just off?
